# Some Page

```{r, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
data = data.frame(
  year = c(2021, 2022, 2023),
  budget = c("$100", "$200", "$300"),
  profit = c("$100", "$200", "$300")
)
```


```{r, echo=F}

for (year in data$year)
{
  # knitr::knit_print(str_glue("## Year: {year}\n"))
  
  data %>% 
    filter(year == year) %>% 
    flextable() %>% 
    bg(part = "header", bg = "grey") %>%
    print()
  
  # knitr::knit_print("\n\n")
}
```
